input.sentences: last summer we went to the beach one morning .
early in the day | before the sun came up | the shore was overcast .
my brother and i walked the sand covered waterfront .
suzie even came down to the water to join us .
we sat there for hours just enjoying the beach .
output.sentences: The beach was quiet on a summer morning
The shore had been blocked from the sun by an overcast sky
My friend and I walked along the sand, enjoying the waterfront
Suzie came to join us, having just gotten out of the water
We all sat for hours enjoying the day
